io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.datacorrection

クラス SourceTimeFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.datacorrection.SourceTimeFunction
  • 直系の既知のサブクラス:
    SourceTimeFunctionByStackedPeaks

    public class SourceTimeFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    Source time function.

    You have to multiply
    Source time function: stf[0], .. stf[np-1]
    on
    Waveform in frequency domain: U[1].. U[np], respectively. See convolve(Complex[])

    • フィールドの詳細

      • np

        protected final int np
        The number of steps in frequency domain. It must be a power of 2.

      • tlen

        protected final double tlen
        timeLength [s]. It must be a tenth of powers of 2

      • samplingHz

        protected final double samplingHz

      • sourceTimeFunction

        protected org.apache.commons.math3.complex.Complex[] sourceTimeFunction
        The length is np

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • SourceTimeFunction

        protected SourceTimeFunction(int np,
                             double tlen,
                             double samplingHz)
        パラメータ:
        np - must be a power of 2
        tlen - [s] must be a tenth of powers of 2
        samplingHz - 20 preferred (now must)

    • メソッドの詳細

      • triangleSourceTimeFunction

        public static SourceTimeFunction triangleSourceTimeFunction(int np,
                                                            double tlen,
                                                            double samplingHz,
                                                            double halfDuration)
        Triangle source time function

        The width is determined by the half duration τ.
        f(t) = 1/τ2 t + 1/τ (-τ ≤ t ≤ 0), -1/τ 2 t + 1/τ (0 ≤ t ≤ τ), 0 (t < -τ, τ < t)
        Source time function F(ω) = (2-2cos(2πωτ)) /(2πωτ)2

        パラメータ:
        np - the number of steps in frequency domain
        tlen - [s] time length
        samplingHz - [Hz]
        halfDuration - [s] of the source
        戻り値:
        SourceTimeFunction

      • boxcarSourceTimeFunction

        public static SourceTimeFunction boxcarSourceTimeFunction(int np,
                                                          double tlen,
                                                          double samplingHz,
                                                          double halfDuration)
        Boxcar source time function

        The width is determined by the half duration τ.
        f(t) = 1/(2×τ) (-τ ≤ t ≤ τ), 0 (t < -τ, τ < t)
        Source time function F(ω) = sin(2πωτ)/(2πωτ);

        パラメータ:
        np - the number of steps in frequency domain
        tlen - [s] time length
        samplingHz - [Hz]
        halfDuration - [s] of the source
        戻り値:
        SourceTimeFunction

      • smoothedRampSourceTimeFunction

        public static SourceTimeFunction smoothedRampSourceTimeFunction(int np,
                                                                double tlen,
                                                                double samplingHz,
                                                                double halfDuration)
        Smoothed ramp source time function

        The width is determined by the half duration τ.
        f(t) = (1-tanh2(2t/τ))/τ (-τ ≤ t ≤ τ), 0 (t < -τ, τ < t)
        Source time function F(ω) = (π2 ωτ/2)/sinh(π2ωτ/2)

        パラメータ:
        np - the number of steps in frequency domain
        tlen - [s] time length
        samplingHz - [Hz]
        halfDuration - [s] of the source
        戻り値:
        SourceTimeFunction

      • checkValues

        protected static boolean checkValues(int np,
                                     double tlen,
                                     double samplingHz)

      • readSourceTimeFunction

        public static SourceTimeFunction readSourceTimeFunction(java.nio.file.Path sourcePath)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        例外:
        java.io.IOException

      • computeSourceTimeFunction

        public static SourceTimeFunction computeSourceTimeFunction(int np,
                                                           double tlen,
                                                           double samplingHz,
                                                           double[] obs,
                                                           double[] syn)
        Source time function is computed simply by division.
        パラメータ:
        obs - waveform of observed
        syn - waveform of syn
        np - steps of frequency [should be same as synthetics]
        tlen - [s] length of waveform [should be same as synthetics]
        samplingHz - [Hz]
        戻り値:
        Source time function F(obs)/F(syn) in frequency domain

      • getNp

        public int getNp()

      • getTlen

        public double getTlen()

      • getSamplingHz

        public double getSamplingHz()

      • getSourceTimeFunctionInFrequencyDomain

        public org.apache.commons.math3.complex.Complex[] getSourceTimeFunctionInFrequencyDomain()
        戻り値:
        source time function in frequency domain. the length is np

      • writeSourceTimeFunction

        public void writeSourceTimeFunction(java.nio.file.Path outPath,
                                    java.nio.file.OpenOption... options)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        パラメータ:
        outPath - Path for a file.
        options - for writing the file
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if the source time function is not computed, then an error occurs

      • convolve

        public final double[] convolve(double[] data)
        Operates convolution for data in time domain.
        パラメータ:
        data - to be convolved in time domain. The data is convolved after FFTed.
        戻り値:
        convolute data in time domain

      • convolve

        public final org.apache.commons.math3.complex.Complex[] convolve(org.apache.commons.math3.complex.Complex[] data)
        Operates convolution for data in frequency domain.
        パラメータ:
        data - to be convolved in frequency domain. The length must be np + 1
        戻り値:
        convolute data in frequency domain

      • convolve

        public final SACData convolve(SACData sacData)
        パラメータ:
        sacData - to convolute with this.
        戻り値:
        convoluted SACData

      • getSourceTimeFunctionInTimeDomain

        public Trace getSourceTimeFunctionInTimeDomain()
        x axis: time [s], y axis: amplitude After considering that conjugate F[i] = F[N-i],
        戻り値:
        trace of Source time function in time domain
